channel.title: Need help with my client
channel.description:
Hi, as my topic says i need help with it. But im not even sure if it doable. If it is then could someone help me set my client so only 1 client can be opened per computer.
And how to set restriction so only 1 account can be done per day.
Waiting for help. Thanks^^.

item.title: Need help with my client
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“xEthanx, post:2, topic:540177”]It’s doable. I believe jar-maker has an option to allow only one instance of application running at one time.

1 account per day from the same IP? That seems a bit harsh lol, but yeah, it’s possible, you’ll have to ask someone else to help you there, though. I’m not very good with sources.[/quote]That will not do much alone.

OP you will need to keep track of logged-in IPs and make sure nobody can multi-login.
Here is a simplistic model,

[code=java]
HashMap<String, Object> playerList = new HashMap<>();
String connectingHost = “…”;

if (!playerList.containsKey(connectingHost)) {
// login as usual
} else {
// multi-login, terminate session
}[/code]

Note: this can be over-come by the use of proxies, for which local killing of multiple client applications should suffice to some degree.
